siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Kumu makes it easy to organize complex data into relationship maps that are beautiful to look at and a pleasure to use. Whether you are mapping people, systems, or concepts in general, if you are focused on relationships we've got you covered.
blogPost.body: Kumu makes it easy to organize complex data into relationship maps that are beautiful to look at and a pleasure to use. Whether you are mapping people, systems, or concepts in general, if you are focused on relationships we've got you covered.
blogPost.title: Kumu - Beautifully organize complex data into relationship maps
blogPost.author: Katerina

localize.description: Kumu可以轻松地将复杂的数据组织到关系图中，这些关系图不仅美观，而且使用起来也很方便。无论您是在绘制人、系统还是一般概念，如果您专注于关系图，我们都能满足您的需求。
localize.tagline: 漂亮地将复杂的数据组织成关系图

localize.description: Kumu可以輕鬆地將複雜的數據組織到關係圖中，這些關係圖不僅美觀，而且使用起來也很方便。無論您是在繪製人、系統還是一般概念，如果您專注於關係圖，我們都能滿足您的需求。
localize.tagline: 漂亮地將複雜的數據組織成關係圖

previous.excerpt: Logica helps finance teams with forecasting. Save time by building a financial model visually and connect tools like QuickBooks and ProfitWell to compare plan vs. actual.
previous.title: Logica - Build a financial model in a drag-and-drop canvas

localize.description: Logica帮助财务团队进行预测。通过可视化地建立财务模型并连接QuickBooks和ProfitWell等工具来比较计划与实际情况，从而节省时间。
localize.tagline: 在拖放画布中建立一个财务模型。

localize.description: Logica幫助財務團隊進行預測。通過可視化地建立財務模型並連接QuickBooks和ProfitWell等工具來比較計劃與實際情況，從而節省時間。
localize.tagline: 在拖放畫布中建立一個財務模型。

next.excerpt: React UI Boutique is a set of beautiful UI components built with Chakra UI and Framer Motion. You can use them to jump-start your projects or get inspiration. Create good looking pages without hiring a designer or losing countless hours doing it yourself.
next.title: React UI Boutique - Beautiful UI blocks built with Chakra UI and Framer Motion

localize.description: React UI Boutique是一套使用Chakra UI和Framer Motion构建的漂亮UI组件。你可以用它们来启动你的项目或获得灵感。创建好看的页面，而不需要聘请设计师，也不需要失去无数个自己动手的时间。
localize.tagline: 使用Chakra UI和Framer Motion构建的漂亮UI块。

localize.description: React UI Boutique是一套使用Chakra UI和Framer Motion構建的漂亮UI組件。你可以用它們來啓動你的項目或獲得靈感。創建好看的頁面，而不需要聘請設計師，也不需要失去無數個自己動手的時間。
localize.tagline: 使用Chakra UI和Framer Motion構建的漂亮UI塊。
